## Data Preparation and Sample Codes for Analysis

```{r hla1}
library(Neoantimon)
data("hla_table")
print(hla_table, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r hla2}
data("hla_table2")
print(hla_table2, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r annovar2}
data("sample_annovar")
print(sample_annovar, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r genomon}
data("sample_genomon")
print(sample_genomon, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r RNAseq}

```

```{r CopyNum}
data("CopyNum")
```
